profileText: a Representative from California; born in Seoul, South Korea, June 21, 1955; B.B.S., Pepperdine University, Malibu, Calif.; M.B.A. University of Southern California, Los Angeles, Calif., 2010; business professional; member, Calif. state board of equalization, 2007-2015; member of the Orange County, Calif. board of supervisors, 2015-2017, chair, 2017-2020; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress (January 3, 2021-present).
